Address.Address1: 257 CHAROEN NAKORN ROAD, BOOKALO, THONBURI, BANGKOK 10600

Description.Text: The hotel is located along the river with an excellent resort atmosphere.Perfect for all types of travellers who are looking for a nice and peaceful place away from home, yet with easy access to the city. A shuttle boat service runs every half hour. This hotel would be suitable for business or leisure travellers.

The hotel is located on the west side of the Chao Phraya River, close to the Krung Thep Bridge on Charoen Nakorn Road, offering another side of the fascinating city of Bangkok. Easy access by Skytrain station Sapan Taksin and free shuttle boat at pier.
Deluxe Riverview rooms are large, comfortable and well equipped with wooden floors and river views. Decoration in Traditional Thai Style all rooms feature balconies.
The exterior is a series of modern low-rise buildings constructed of brick and tile with Thai architectural accents, set in lovely gardens with a gorgeous swimming pool.
The restaurants provide a wide and varied dinning experience, including Chinese cuisine, French, Polynesian and a Japanese-American restaurant. The hotel also has a taditional Thai dance show.
The lobby is large with plenty of seating area in classic Thai style.
